short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Saves a page widget to a Stratum server

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Saves a page widget to a Stratum server. This is a DevTools extension to be used with the Stratum quality register platform. Requires certificate to work. Contact Registercentrum Västra Götaland for more information.
